text: Not all five Spice Girls were invited to the royal wedding, Page Six reports. Apparently, only Victoria Beckham ( who attended William and Kate's wedding in 2011 ), Geri Halliwell and Emma Bunton are on the guest list, a source told the celeb news site. That means only Posh Spice, Ginger Spice and Baby Spice will be present, while Sporty Spice ( Mel C ) and Scary Spice ( Mel B ) are MIA. To put salt in our wounds, the insider added that Spice Girls ` ` were never going to perform'' at the wedding in the first place.
